description: Black Barrel&nbsp;Sazerac is best served as a refreshing cocktail for the fall season. This recipe pairs well with many traditional appetizers and entrees. The best part about this cocktail is that it only requires a few ingredients to make!
name: Black Barrel Sazerac
recipeIngredient: Dash of White creme de cacao

recipeInstructions.name: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with absinthe and set aside.
recipeInstructions.text: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with absinthe and set aside.

recipeInstructions.name: In a mixing tin, add the dash of agave nectar along with white creme de cacao. Add in Peychaud’s bitters along with angostura bitters.
